reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson explains complex concepts clearly and is always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Chen's enthusiasm for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and interesting lab work. Dr. Martinez is knowledgeable and approachable.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Tough grader, but fair. Homework can be overwhelming at times.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Fantastic instructor! Dr. Thompson makes the material relatable and easy to understand.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Interesting course content, but lectures can be a bit dry sometimes.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is passionate about chemistry and it shows in her teaching. Great lab experiments!

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions in class. Prof. Brown encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee brings real-world examples into the classroom. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Challenging course material, but Prof. Garcia is always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Engaging lectures with beautiful visuals. Dr. White's passion for art is inspiring.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Miller facilitates great class discussions and encourages diverse viewpoints.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's field trips and hands-on activities make this course unforgettable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting topics, but Prof. Jones can sometimes be unclear in his explanations.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Adams makes linguistics fun and accessible. Great course for language enthusiasts!

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Prof. Wright brings valuable industry experience to the classroom. Practical assignments.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Dr. Nelson is knowledgeable and approachable.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Prof. Scott's enthusiasm for music is contagious. Great mix of theory and practice.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding course. Dr. Rodriguez explains complex concepts well.

reviews.subject: Theater Arts
reviews.review: Prof. Turner's acting workshops are incredibly helpful. Supportive and encouraging instructor.
